device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <config> <!--Configure the SIP server address.--> <sip_server>%%pbx_ip%%</sip_server>
<!--Specify the port for the SIP server.--> <sip_server_port>%%param::sipport%%</sip_server_port>
<!--Configure the register user name.--> <user_name>%%extension_number%%</user_name>
<!--Configure the username and password for register authentication.--> <auth_name>%%extension_auth_id%%</auth_name> <auth_password>%%extension_auth_pw%%</auth_password>
<!--Configure the Provisioning URL to download the "MOBILENUMBER.xml" provisioning file.--> <prov_url>%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%</prov_url>
</config>
